mapper.select: (select name, (select count(*) from job_post jp where jp.city_info = city.code) AS value from city order by value desc limit 10) union (select '其他城市' AS name, count(1) AS value from job_post)

(select jt.name, (select count(*) from job_post jp where jt.id = jp.job_category) AS value from job_type jt order by value desc limit 30) union (select '其他类型' AS name, count(1) AS value from job_post)

select value_list value, name_list name from ((select count(*) as value_list, WEEKDAY(date_add(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL - 6 DAY)) + 1 as name_list from day_active_user as dau where dau.creat_time BETWEEN unix_timestamp(TIMESTAMP(date_add(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL - 6 DAY))) * 1000 AND unix_timestamp(TIMESTAMP(date_add(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL -5 DAY))) * 1000)
union (select count(*) as value_list, WEEKDAY(date_add(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL - 5 DAY)) + 1 as name_list from day_active_user as dau where dau.creat_time BETWEEN unix_timestamp(TIMESTAMP(date_add(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL - 5 DAY))) * 1000 AND unix_timestamp(TIMESTAMP(date_add(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL -4 DAY))) * 1000) union (select count(*) as value_list, WEEKDAY(date_add(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL - 4 DAY)) + 1 as name_list from day_active_user as dau where dau.creat_time BETWEEN unix_timestamp(TIMESTAMP(date_add(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL - 4 DAY))) * 1000 AND unix_timestamp(TIMESTAMP(date_add(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL -3 DAY))) * 1000) union (select count(*) as value_list, WEEKDAY(date_add(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL - 3 DAY)) + 1 as name_list from day_active_user as dau where dau.creat_time BETWEEN unix_timestamp(TIMESTAMP(date_add(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL - 3 DAY))) * 1000 AND unix_timestamp(TIMESTAMP(date_add(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL -2 DAY))) * 1000) union (select count(*) as value_list, WEEKDAY(date_add(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL - 2 DAY)) + 1 as name_list from day_active_user as dau where dau.creat_time BETWEEN unix_timestamp(TIMESTAMP(date_add(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL - 2 DAY))) * 1000 AND unix_timestamp(TIMESTAMP(date_add(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL -1 DAY))) * 1000) union (select count(*) as value_list, WEEKDAY(date_add(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL - 1 DAY)) + 1 as name_list from day_active_user as dau where dau.creat_time BETWEEN unix_timestamp(TIMESTAMP(date_add(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL - 1 DAY))) * 1000 AND unix_timestamp(TIMESTAMP(CURRENT_DATE())) * 1000) union (select count(*) as value_list, WEEKDAY(CURRENT_DATE()) + 1 as name_list from day_active_user as dau where dau.creat_time BETWEEN unix_timestamp(TIMESTAMP(CURRENT_DATE())) * 1000 AND unix_timestamp(TIMESTAMP(date_add(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL 1 DAY))) * 1000)) dau
